website_summaries.verdict: An erupting volcano is just one of the 20+ fun science experiments in this kit.
pros: Kit includes 24 items to complete 21 science experiments
Clear step-by-step instructions that children can follow
cons: Some household items needed for the experiment aren't included in the kit

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it and so fun!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my my 5 year old for his birthday. Something fun my dad can do with him every Friday when he picks him up from school. On Thursdays my son is so excited because on Fridays he knows Papa picks him up from school and they do their experiments together! What a great way to have fun while learning! Instructions are clear and all supplies are provided, with the exception of a few basic household items like baking soda.
customer_reviews.author: Julie DuBois

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 9 year old son who loves to figure out how the world works so I thought so cool science experiments would be fun. He did a few today and loved it! Everything was age appropriate while not being too baby-ish. It also enabled him to come up with experiments on his own which was super fun. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly C.

customer_reviews.title: Great adulational game!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This game is a great snowday activity and all year round as well! It allows the children to have fun while learning at the same time!! It is very age appropriate and the directions are easy enough to follow that they can do it on their own!! I would highly reccomend this game!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Underwhelming...
customer_reviews.text: A bit underwhelmed with this science experiment kit. The experiments were pretty boring (even our homemade volcano was more exciting than the ones in this kit), the glow in the dark powder didn't work (even when leaving it in the sun) and most of the experiments you can find doing a search in Google. On a positive, I thought the instruction manual was great. I just wish the experiments were a little more unique for the price.
customer_reviews.author: belgirl

customer_reviews.title: Top notch quality and kid-friendly!
customer_reviews.text: My kids absolutely loved this kit! The directions are so well-written. Thry were able to do all of the experiments themselves! They had many hours of fun together. Is a mom, I'm very pleased and will be buying more kits from this company. Top notch!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I like how the box included all the necessary supplies for the experiments! Received a personal thank you card from the company! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Hardcastle

customer_reviews.title: nice birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: decent birthday gift for 6 years old kiddo to explore the science experiments.
customer_reviews.author: SPH

customer_reviews.title: Things like this kit brings families together. Time away from the IPad!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old grandson loved this kit! It was a family affair, which is always nice .
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Everything included
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast as expected with Amazon Prime orders. I can’t truly attest to the kit itself since it is for a child from a giving tree. But the kit itself comes with everything you need to carry out the experiments. Many of the kits on amazon require you to use various items from around your home. While that may not be too terrible for many to just go buy them, the kids from the giving tree don’t come from a financially stable home SO providing everything inside the kit already was a huge plus for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Just a bunch of cheap items in the set and charge too much for those plastics. The 20+ experiments are mostly very similar and they all can be done without the set, they all can be done just simple household items. It is a huge disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Kah-Wai Lin

customer_reviews.title: Love everything about this science kit!
customer_reviews.text: I am a retired educator at the elementary level and our nation lags behind in math and science. I bought this for 9 yr old grand daughter. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Unimpressive kit
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. The experiments are underwhelming and require a lot of items from home. The 1st experiment was mixing oil and water from your house. I’m sorry but why am I paying for a product that didn’t actually supply anything. The kit does supply some chemicals but the chemicals could easily be purchased from the store for much cheaper (i.e. baking soda). Several of the experiments are variations of volcano eruptions but the cheap tiny volcano supplied hardly looks like it is erupting. The one positive about the kit is that it got my 5 year old into science and wanting to perform experiments.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Best science kit ever!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter gives this science kit a five out of five stars for the following reasons. The directions are super easy to understand and follow along. They have pictures to follow to perform the experiment and there are plenty of supplies to perform all of the task. And of course using the prime delivery was fast and on time.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Chich

customer_reviews.title: Lab Coat Code Not Good
customer_reviews.text: The Science kit itself is probably great, it will be a gift so it is not opened yet but it was advertised that I could order the Lab coat for 50% off, that code is no longer good so I wish that ad was gone too. I'm sure the science kit will be enjoyed.
customer_reviews.author: Smith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Experiment Kit for Kids!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son is extremely into doing experiments and this was the perfect kit! What makes it’s so great is everything is included! The most you need to supply is water and dish soap for most experiments. He has been having a great time testing everything out! Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren C

customer_reviews.title: Exciting product
customer_reviews.text: This going to be a Christmas gift for my 10 year old nephew. I think he will be quite pleased. I can’t wait to do the experiments.
customer_reviews.author: melissamo

customer_reviews.title: Great kit for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute kit! Has almost everything you need! My 7 year old daughter and 4 year old son loved all the different volcanoes they could do! It was easy to clean and restart. We haven’t done all the different experiments yet but we look forward to trying out the others! Also a little after we bought it we got a personal postcard from the makers of the kit! I loved the personal touch!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids.
customer_reviews.text: I have kids of all ages. So far, they seem to have enjoyed wokring on the experiements together. Easy enough but still fun and engaging.
customer_reviews.author: Laural Janke

customer_reviews.title: You're basically paying $30 for a cheap volcano.
customer_reviews.text: Not satisfied with this gift at all. It was for my 4 year old son, to try and get some quality science time in. All off the experiments are kinda lame. More like "comparative" experiments instead of "reactive" .. meaning less explosions or reactions, and more "this is hot, and this is cold" - basically not worth the $30.
customer_reviews.author: Timmy Kicks

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift for my 6-year-old nanny child and she loved it! We had a fun couple of days doing the experiments. She eventually lost interest as kids do, and was kind of disappointed that the crystal growing was not more elaborate. Overall a nice set for a rainy day or day off of school. If the child can read, they should be able to conduct experiments all by themselves while you do whatever you need to do.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: My kids had fun with it it’s really not what I expected I didn’t like the fact that for the lava lamp it only came with enough supplies for one my kids also didn’t like the crystals and most of the experiments that came in the book we could’ve looked it up online
customer_reviews.author: Dayna

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Fun to do with the Family
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for something to do with my 6 year old that would educate him as well as have him enjoy it and talk about it with his friends. I had enough of the YouTube videos and Video games so I searched out something involving science. I came across this and immediately ordered it. We received it and have had so much fun doing the experiments. I would recommend it to anyone who has young children to get them interested in Science.
customer_reviews.author: Emerson Stratton

customer_reviews.title: Amazing fun
customer_reviews.text: Kids loves this kit everything was perfect and excellent communication from seller and shipping!!
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: More like 4 (lame) experiments
customer_reviews.text: There's a picture of a cool volcano experiment in the front of it, so I was kind of expecting 20 more of that. The volcano experiment is kinda lackluster, but then 5 of the experiments are the same thing. Volcano plus add food color, volcano plus add bubbles, volcano plus whatever else. That should only count as 1. One experiment was a recipe for mayonnaise. Highly disappointing. Definitely not worth $30.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Pine

customer_reviews.title: Neat experiments for kids and parents
customer_reviews.text: Very cool experiments; just read warnings before you let kids play with it bc urea can be harmful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for learning.
customer_reviews.text: This was for my 5 yo, who absolutely loves it. We call it out science experiments. He was begging the next day after doing a few to bring it out again. I love how it teaches the kids (and adults) through some basic experiments what is actually happening on a chemical level.
customer_reviews.author: Anne M. Alderson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Cool experiments for kids
customer_reviews.text: Great kit for beginners. My 6 year old played with it and did all the experiments. Only needing a couple of household ingredients. We all really enjoyed the simplicity of the projects that were age appropriate. The only suggestion I have is resealable bags for the ingredients. Would buy for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive for what is in the box
customer_reviews.text: Way way way too expensive for you get in the box. I was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Broken & Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Well when I opened this I didn't get to do the first experiment because the beaker I got was broken. Also the dropper was not working and appeared to have a hole in it as well. Very disappointed with the quality as the experiments seemed well laid out.
customer_reviews.author: Marnie Shotwell

customer_reviews.title: Need a lot of stuff not included
customer_reviews.text: To do many of the experiments you have to use things from home. I did not know this so my Grandson was disappointed when we didn’t have all the things to do them.
customer_reviews.author: Hask3330

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Got as a gift for a cousin. He really loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great kit!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing deal!! You get so much supplies in this one kit especially for the price. It arrived on time and packages great!!
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Not much fun.
customer_reviews.text: This has not proved to be a good purchase for us. The experiments are not really that interesting, and don’t work very well. The “volcano” isn’t very exciting, we get way better results with just vinegar and baking soda. We just tried the “glow in the dark lava lamp” which did not glow in the dark and barely even fixed up a little, it didnt look like a lava lamp at all and just created an oily mess. The list of things you need for the project is not always accurate, which is confusing. All in all, I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: markia gwara

customer_reviews.title: So far many of the results are a dud
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is 5 and we have completed five experiments. We have done three of the volcanos and they ended up being little more than bubbled water going around the mountain with and without color. He experienced an experiment at school and expected a whole lot more. We haven't tried the mentone and coke one yet though. We just finished the lava lamp which looks nothing like one plus it has glow in the dark additives which after entering a dark bathroom with the door closed produced no glow what so ever.
customer_reviews.author: anita l sniezko

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit for young kids
customer_reviews.text: The volcanoes is pretty cool and we made crystals which my 5 year old son loves.
customer_reviews.author: Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Fun kit for kids
customer_reviews.text: Fun kit but my kid didn't have enough patience. Nothing wrong with the kit at all and provides good clear instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun Experiments
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to do experiments with my granddaughter who is 4 years old. I liked that most of the items needed to conduct the experiments were included. The directions were easy to follow. My granddaughter had a lot of fun doing the experiments with me there to direct her. The glow-in-the-dark powder did not work when we first used it, but when I emailed the company, they got back to me right away and instructed me to try putting the powder in the light before using it. That worked.
customer_reviews.author: klaus pilz

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This product is a great value for the price. I like how many different types of experiments were included and that most things were included in the kit. I do wish the powers came in resealable packages. If you didn't have a ziploc bag to put the powders in immediately you run the risk of them spilling everywhere which did happen to me.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Ahles

customer_reviews.title: Highly suggest
customer_reviews.text: My 5 yr old son and me love these experiments. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Great Family Fun Projects
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter's 6th birthday. Turns out its been great fun and learning for the whole family. And the cute little note in the mail from Laura was a nice touch as well. Great product, great sellers.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany H.

customer_reviews.title: Birthday Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a 9 year old boy’s birthday. He was very excited when he opened it and thought it was a great gift
customer_reviews.author: Codecutter

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!!
customer_reviews.text: My children absolutely loved doing these projects! And with the wonderful guide we can continue to experiment! Their favorite was the underwater volcanoe! Such a great way to have fun and teach the kiddos!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Ann Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Angel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a Christmas angel gift, so I have personally not used it but it came quickly and was a good price. My daughter has one that is similar and she loves the activities that are in this!
customer_reviews.author: apierce125

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Experience
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this product. The company is awesome. I received a hand written note from the company thanking me for the purchase and checking on my satisfaction. Sincerely recommend this product and company.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Clay

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a lot of fun!!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time just as described!! Days later relieved a handwritten card to thank me for my purchase. Will buy from this company again
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Bought for 5 year old grandson and it was perfect! He did experiments right away and was able to handle all the lab equipment! LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.author: Cindy G

customer_reviews.title: Requires additional supplies
customer_reviews.text: What I dislike about this product is the fact that it requires you to provide several supplies from home. A lot of these items are no big deal like dishwashing soap, scissors or paper clips but that should be included in the description before you order. It’s stupid not to. Very annoying and I would not have ordered it if it would have been there which is possibly the reason why they didn’t tell you that isn’t it? Wouldn’t purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is still alive!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful customer service. Got a nice thank you post card for my purchase. Fast shipping and great value. Would love to purchase more from this seller!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Happy Grandson
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old grandson is having quite a lot of fun with this kit. The only drawback is that he has run out of coloring agent and I have not been able to buy it for him. Amazon doesn’t sell it.
customer_reviews.author: Conchita Julia

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding kit for kids to engage and learn about science
customer_reviews.text: Our kids are definitely enjoying the kit. It gives them something hands on to work with especially since they've been staying home. There's opportunities for them to learn through the several engaging and fun activities provided. The customer service is excellent as they quickly sent a replacement for a broken beaker that we found when we opened the package.
customer_reviews.author: REE

customer_reviews.title: Overly rated
customer_reviews.text: The only good part of this kit was the volcano eruption, the rest is total garbage. Save your money and find something more valuable.
customer_reviews.author: ev

customer_reviews.title: Good gift for kids interested in science
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my grandson (6) for his birthday... he loves anything weather, science or space related. He was really excited and has already done several experiments. I think some things are a little advanced for him, but for the most part they are at his level.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dravk

customer_reviews.title: Fun!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our son for xmas and wow now with the pandemic this was a fun project to keep him busy and having fun!
customer_reviews.author: Ariel and kirk

customer_reviews.title: Great science experiments
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my grandkids first and second grade, a great kit!! Start with simple experiments then move forward. Directions are very clear, must do it with them though.
customer_reviews.author: marcy

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my nephew. He hasn’t used it yet but I am hoping this winter his parents will let him. Looks like a neat kit.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Kids love the volcanoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew's 6th birthday. He loves it and often wakes my sister up at 5 am so they can do experiments before school. Great gift for kids interested in Science.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Halland

customer_reviews.title: Age appropriate
customer_reviews.text: Gift for 6 year old granddaughter she was amazed had never had anything like it will buy additional items from thisbrand
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 6 and 8 year olds and they loved it. It had lots of options and was very easy to follow the directions. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Teresa Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great way to occupy kids
customer_reviews.text: My daughter couldnt wait to do these experiments. She spend hours doing them and took over my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly O

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun little kit. Age appropriate. Good experiments. Enjoyed helping out our kids with it.
customer_reviews.author: Review101

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful science kit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my grandson he opened it up started reading the directions and went to work at it my son-in-law told me that it is very well-made very easy to understand and that as a family they are enjoying the experiments.
customer_reviews.author: diane hall

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter was SO excited and couldn’t wait to open the box!
customer_reviews.author: TxRver

customer_reviews.title: Great present!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew and he loved it! Came with all of the materials so that was a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: So cool!
customer_reviews.text: So cool! Gave this as a gift and he loves it!! I even love it. A lot of cool experiments to do.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves anything scientific. He’s had so much fun with this kit. Great buy.

customer_reviews.title: Lab experiments package
customer_reviews.text: This was a great way to educate my 5 year old son about science. The package has several experiment sets that are ready to use with written instructions. My kid was very excited to do the volcano and the crystallization experiments. We still have more experiments to do.
customer_reviews.author: Majed

customer_reviews.title: It was ok
customer_reviews.text: Experiments are ok. You can probably do these experiments with stuff you have at home.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Do need adult supervision and home ingredients. Read first to get ingredients before actually doing the experiment. Great enjoyment by my 5 year old grandson.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, price, and shipping!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product for kids, east to use, excellent price and fast shipping!!

customer_reviews.title: A family fun science kit
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old son absolutely loves this kit!! We have done many different experiments and if he could he'd do them everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Mamaz Salez

customer_reviews.title: Very nice kit
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to read instructions, my 7 year old loves it. I would buy two if the price was better.

customer_reviews.title: Super fun
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this. His only 5 but has a very ensuring mind and loves doing stuff ! We spent hours playing with it Very safe to use and the instruction manual was super easy to follow
customer_reviews.author: Anne D.

customer_reviews.title: Great family night activity
customer_reviews.text: My family loved it great family activity.. easy to read and follow instructions so everyone can get involved
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Fun experiments
customer_reviews.text: Fun experiments for kids. Keeps them entertained while learning. Nice buy!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: My boy loved it. how simple, readable it is
customer_reviews.text: instructions is easy for a child to follow. the missing star is for not having like a notebook to record their own results
customer_reviews.author: Rehab Ali

customer_reviews.title: Great...but
customer_reviews.text: Great idea for projects during quarantine. Was missing the purple sweet potato powder. Can someone send?
customer_reviews.author: MrsMurphy

customer_reviews.title: Great learning tool and lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to my great nephew for his birthday! He Loves it! Lots of experiments! Great learning too! ! I will order more in the future for gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: Only issue is my son doesn't want to undo what he has made. Wish there was a site to reorder the test tubes and foaming agent
customer_reviews.author: Christina J Gray

customer_reviews.title: The perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my nephew. He is just a year older than my daughter. It came perfectly on time perfectly packaged. They opened it together and begin doing some of the experiments without any help and loved it. With a little coaxing they learned they could read the directions and do even more experiments .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: Gave it as a gift for a very bright 6 year old...he loves it

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: The experiments are pretty lame. You have to supply most of the materials. It's well put together but not very exciting. Get your kid a 2lt of soda and a roll of Mentos. Save $50.
customer_reviews.author: Gbroker83

customer_reviews.title: Little experiments
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this however the experiments are extremely simple and only last a couple minutes each if that. It gets my 4 year olds attention though would not recommend for older kids

customer_reviews.title: Amazing price, amazing kit!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a Birthday gift for a boy. His mom txted me couple days later saying how much fun he has with this kit and not only just him, the whole family had fun with the excitements! Such a great gift to buy! Thinking to purchase this again for my daughter for Christmas. Thank you so much for this fabulous science kit!
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift!
customer_reviews.text: The experiments are described easily. My almost 4 year old and my 7 year old know exactly what to do after reading the instructions to them. The included supplies are easily found.

customer_reviews.title: Missing an item, but otherwise good
customer_reviews.text: The kit was great, but it was missing the test tube connector
customer_reviews.author: Alexa723

customer_reviews.title: Awesome kid lab set!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a super fun and easy lab set, my 4 year old LOVED it. Would highly recommend as a gift for a little one in your life as it is not super messy and its awesome watching them learn hands on. Would buy any toy or set that this brand comes out with and be confident in the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: I really can’t say much above it. It’s fit my granddaughter for Christmas

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this. I have a 12, 7, and 4 year old and they all enjoy playing with it. The only thing I would change if I could is the "glow" powder for the volcano to glow when erupting doesn't work well and isn't very bright. I don't know if it would be better with a blacklight, but it might.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Ridgely

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids who love science
customer_reviews.text: I bought this particular science kit because it has multiple experiments that will fascinate by nephew.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Perfect experiment kit for a beginner! The kids really enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: Fish

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son as a birthday present. We have only done some of the experiments but my son likes it. Some of the experiments you can do on your own and do not need the kit, that was a bummer to me, but again my 6 year old son was happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Christelm

customer_reviews.title: Science Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved this science kit. The directions were easy for my ten year son to follow. Kept them entertained and learning at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Irvin

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun for my 9 year old daughter
customer_reviews.text: My daughter played with this for 3 straight hours and loved it! Great price and hours of tablet free fun!

customer_reviews.title: Great for a science loving kid
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old niece loves her birthday gift. She does 1-2 projects a week.

customer_reviews.title: Its okay
customer_reviews.text: Dont like that you need to have half the ingredients at home to do most of these experiments.
customer_reviews.author: Parent

customer_reviews.title: Great for home schooling!
customer_reviews.text: I got this when we were surprised by the school shut down in the spring, and did a couple of the experiments every week with our 5 and 7yo kids - they loved it so much they asked to redo the experiments when "school" was over! They were able to do the steps and participate rather than just watch. It's a great kit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our School Science Night Prize
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get to test everything, but it's a great prize for our school prize basket and at a great prize compared to other kits.

customer_reviews.title: Super fun
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old son loved this! A lot of quarantine fun too!

customer_reviews.title: A great educational toy
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun experiments for my 6 year old Grandson

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My 6yr old loves this type of thing. We’ve done one experiment so far and he LOVED it!!!

product_meta.title: Learn & Climb Science Kit for Kids - 21 Experiments Science Set, Hours of Fun.
feature_bullets: 21 Mind Blowing Experiments – The science kit for kids has 21 exciting and interesting activities including; create your own lava lamp, creative crystals and of course volcano science kit the favorite of every child.

All inclusive – This 24 piece kids science kit includes everything you need besides common household items. ( like eggs oil & water) All the chemicals, ingredients and apparatus that is required to create more than 20 experiments are included and neatly packed!

Child Friendly– The detailed clear color manual and online demonstration videos will teach your children to complete the science experiments with easy to follow step-by step instructions. All ingredients included are safe and child friendly.

Learning Through Play– The kit allows your young scientist to explore, learn & have great fun with their very own science set. Because of the number of amazing science experiments for kids your children will have many hours of educational hands on stem learning.
